trigger.name: account_list_start
trigger.send:
require "wait"
totalgold=0
re="^(?P<player>[a-zA-Z]+)\\\\s+Lvl\\\\s+(?P<level>[0-9]+)\\\\s+Gold\\\\s+(?P<gold>[0-9]+)"
wait.make(function () repeat line, wc = wait.regexp(re, 1) if line ~= nil then totalgold=totalgold+wc.gold end until line==nil ColourNote("lightgrey", "black", "\\r\\nTotal account gold: "..totalgold.."\\r\\n") end)
